step.framework.ws.registry
Class NamePatternQuery

java.lang.Object
  step.framework.ws.registry.Query
      step.framework.ws.registry.NamePatternQuery

public class NamePatternQuery
extends Query

Query for web service registration using a name pattern. Name pattern syntax follows SQL-92 LIKE specification. For instance, "%" is a wildcard.
